mdRecord.dcterms:description: Various graffiti riffing on sexual innuendo with the word "beef." Comment about belief in God and luck, with drawing of cross. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
I want some beef | I wanna eat soup | White beef | I WANT ALL THIS | MULTI-COLORED BEEF IN MY MOUTH | you don't believe in God, I don't believe in luck
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Food
Penis
God
Doodles
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: University of Virginia. Library. New Stacks. Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
